title: The Cartoon History of the Universe II, Vol. 8-13: From the Springtime of China to the Fall of Rome
description: Here's a new installment of the phenomenal bestseller that Publishers Weekly selected as one of the twelve graphic books of all time. Spanning ages and continents from Ancient India to Rome and China in A.D. 600, Volume II is hip, funny, and full of info.B & W illustrations.
author: Larry Gonick
